Two users encrypted their passwords with RSA, unknowingly sharing a prime. Crack both with 7087908117810004870271059308072034084903103717089121221809948956690658185961773086508750826665949633422283397984787860477809311769924815972146811724694759 and discover the security flaw.

The flag format is flag{...}
n=7970661802866946003691595967859669034494095026172288933441000880346749206777550698997643939911656052761894087628996100948252997542312083662168332420839639, n2=6348465701491682400698241652737207762799468165435898266360104761959201935933946580363672977406705335423488547302202276661366357591374870518373708481423327, e=6328490624308290017409249152945926092420651260515370977577552675472547436569904184233802175455980780440846739548124797776514185898352267727167476014599389

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{oqurh4sc}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 7087908117810004870271059308072034084903103717089121221809948956690658185961773086508750826665949633422283397984787860477809311769924815972146811724694759
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=7970661802866946003691595967859669034494095026172288933441000880346749206777550698997643939911656052761894087628996100948252997542312083662168332420839639, n2=6348465701491682400698241652737207762799468165435898266360104761959201935933946580363672977406705335423488547302202276661366357591374870518373708481423327, e=6328490624308290017409249152945926092420651260515370977577552675472547436569904184233802175455980780440846739548124797776514185898352267727167476014599389
extra_info: p=99862117350836215426513550985117312310055728244792165403460367866883606656771, q=79816671369628255451759158424801635348182265478705931824501268897004372759709, q2=63572312203117153839667304228785878863308850803436608574232185666988989486837, φ(n)=7970661802866946003691595967859669034494095026172288933441000880346749206777371020208923475440777780052484168681337862954529499445084122025404444441423160, φ(n2)=6348465701491682400698241652737207762799468165435898266360104761959201935933783145934119024037439154568274644111028912082318128817397177964839835885279720
subtype: shared_prime
archetype: rsa
